mapper.update: update news set news_type=#{newsType}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, url=#{url}, image_url=#{imageUrl} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.model_name as modelName from news a left join model b on a.news_type=b.id where 1=1 and a.id=#{id}

select a.id, a.artical_id as articalId, a.user_id as userId, a.user_name as userName, a.content, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, b.title, c.model_name as modelName from common a left join news b on a.artical_id=b.id left join model c on b.news_type=c.id where 1=1 and a.artical_id=#{articalId} and a.type=1
mapper.delete: delete from common where type=1 and artical_id=#{articalId}
